scripts.build-if-needed: npm run check-build && { echo 'Changes detected in packages/, running build:cli:dev...'; pnpm -C ../.. build:cli:dev && touch ./.build-marker; } || echo 'No changes in packages/, skipping build:cli:dev'
scripts.build: npm run build-if-needed && clear && node ../../packages/rspack-cli/bin/rspack.js build
